mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sheet.song_info(songName, artist, producerName, genre, keyName, bpm, songForm, beat, songId, userId) values(#{songName}, #{artist}, #{producerName}, #{genre}, #{keyName}, #{bpm}, #{songForm}, #{beat}, #{songId}, #{userId});
INSERT INTO sheet.inst_info(songId, instName, trackNum) values(#{songId}, #{instName}, #{trackNum});
INSERT INTO sheet.chord_info(songId, chord, measureNum) values(#{songId}, #{chord}, #{measureNum});
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM sheet.song_info WHERE songName=#{songName};
mapper.update: update sheet.song_info set songName = #{songName}, artist = #{artist}, genre = #{genre}, keyName = #{keyName},bpm = #{bpm}, songForm = #{songForm}, beat = #{beat} where songId = #{songId};
update sheet.inst_info set instName = #{instName} where songId = #{songId} and trackNum = #{trackNum};
update sheet.chord_info set chord = #{chord} where songId = #{songId} and measureNum = #{measureNum};
